title: Integrated therapy treating obesity and depression is effective

title_detail.value: Integrated therapy treating obesity and depression is effective

summary: An intervention combining behavioral weight loss treatment and problem-solving therapy with as-needed antidepressant medication for participants with co-occurring obesity and depression improved weight loss and depressive symptoms compared with routine physician care.
